Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 65th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1979...
Injured on 4/2/1981 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/21/1982 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/22/1982 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Earned first career win on 5/11/1984...
Injured on 7/7/1985 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Pitcher in 1989...
Injured on 6/12/1991 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 9/17/1991, off Gregorio Armas (MAN)...
Injured on 9/5/1992 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 2/9/1993 to a 2-year deal worth $466,400 per year...
